verses.name: Ezekiel 7:20
verses.text: As for the beauty of his ornament, he set it in majesty: but they made the images of their abominations and of their detestable things therein: therefore have I set it far from them.

verses.name: Ezekiel 7:21
verses.text: And I will give it into the hands of the strangers for a prey, and to the wicked of the earth for a spoil; and they shall pollute it.

verses.name: Ezekiel 7:22
verses.text: My face will I turn also from them, and they shall pollute my secret place: for the robbers shall enter into it, and defile it.
